enemy.data.reaper.name: Reaper
enemy.data.reaper.description.visuals: Dark blue smoke shaped like the top of a human body with broad shoulders and large arms. It has a skeletal head with empty eye sockets and no bottom part below the nose except for a set of fangs. It is holding a long scythe made of bone with the head of a dead creature on top and the blade made of some blue crystal coming out of the creatures mouth.
